clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Lacosamide is indicated for adjunctive therapy for partial onset seizures in patients with epilepsy over 17 years old Injection is indicated for short term use when oral therapy is not feasible

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Lacosamide therapy is correlated with a decrease in seizure frequency It should be noted that in group analyses dosages above 400 mg day do not appear to result in additional benefit
